attributes.action: Dont increase tax rate on red diesel
attributes.additional_details: Keep the red diesel rate at the low. Most businesses mainly in the farming industry will suffer tremendously if the price of red diesel was to be increased by the tax charges. Farming, construction, marine and many more industries will end up in financial difficulties if red diesel was to be taxed at the same rate as white diesel.
attributes.background: Freeze the idea of an increase in tax charges for consumers of red diesel.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/300530
